title: Find a Lost Item
description: A passenger who deplaned an hour ago calls to report they left their tablet on the aircraft.

tasks.description: Gather details from the passenger: flight number, seat number, and a description of the item.
Contact the cleaning crew or gate agent at the arrival airport for the flight.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully contacts the ground staff.

tasks.description: The cleaning crew finds the tablet. The agent coordinates with the passenger on how they can retrieve their item from the airport's lost and found office.
tasks.expected_outcome: The item is found and the agent provides the passenger with clear instructions for retrieval.
